SELECT lv.id, lv.title, lv.live_status liveStatus, lv.start_time startTime, lv.cover_img coverImg, lv.live_type_id liveTypeId, lv.live_duration liveDuration, lv.update_time updateTime, lv.flash_obj flashObj, lv.view_count viewCount, lt. `name` , lv.live_url liveUrl, lv.preview_url previewUrl, lv.review_url reviewUrl FROM kf_live lv LEFT JOIN kf_live_type lt ON lv.live_type_id = lt.id
lv.is_delete = 0 AND lv.is_publish = 1 AND lv.live_type_id != 1
AND lv.title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
limit #{offset} ,#{pcount}

SELECT cc.card_type cardType, cc.publish_time publishTime, cc.type, c.id, c.content_type contentType, c.title, c.image, c.content_style contentStyle, c.source_type sourceType, c.view_count viewCount, c.custom_url customUrl, c.category, cc.channel_id channelId FROM kf_content c INNER JOIN kf_channel_content cc ON c.id = cc.content_id AND cc.from_type = 1 AND cc.check_status = 1
c.content_state = 1 AND (c.check_status = 1 OR c.is_check = 1) AND cc.check_status = 1
AND cc.is_publish = #{pub}
AND c.content_type = 4
AND c.source_type = 1
AND c.title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
GROUP BY c.id order by cc.publish_time desc limit #{offset} ,#{pcount}
